thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: Waterford.LIZ

author: Waterford.LIZ
title: Waterford.LIZ
text: Helpful honest customer service. Will definitely go back for future appliances, however the delivery system needs to be addressed. One man delivered my American fridge freezer!! He had to make several phone calls for someone to come help him, ridiculous to expect one person to deliver such a big appliance. I was lucky it didn't rain as my fridge was in the front drive for 30 mins. Delivery man was a gent who did his best to get the item into the house.
